ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Our Lord knows we have been sent as Messengers to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The messengers) said: "Our Lord knows that we have been sent to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Messengers said: “Our Lord knows that we have indeed been sent to you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "Our Lord knows that We are Messengers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They answered, “Our Lord knows that surely, without doubt, we have been sent towards you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Messengers said: "Our Lord knows that we have been sent as Messengers to you,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Our Lord knows that we are most surely apostles to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Our Lord knows we are Envoys unto you;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They answered: Our Lord knoweth that we are indeed sent unto you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Our Lord knows that we have been sent to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: our Lord knoweth that we are surely Unto you the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Our Lord knows that we have indeed been sent to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Our Lord doth know that we have been sent on a mission to you:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Messengers said: "Our Lord knows that we have been sent as Messengers to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said: 'Our Lord knows that we are Messengers to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:16] They said, ‘Our Lord knows (qālū rabbunā ya‘lamu functions like an oath. Emphasis is intensified by this [oath] and also by the [addition of the] lām to what was before [simply, mursalūna, ‘we have been sent’] to counter their intensified denial) that we have indeed been sent to you [by Him]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They answered) the apostles answered: (Our Lord knoweth) testifies (that we are indeed sent unto you,
